## extensionFilter() function

A factory function to create binding filter for extensions of a named extension point

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function extensionFilter(extensionPointName: string): BindingFilter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  extensionPointName | <code>string</code> | Name of the extension point |

<b>Returns:</b>

`BindingFilter`
